title: Collate company data from one website and add the phone numbers to if from another
snippet:
Using this website (http://www.tan.gov.uk/tanen/vosa_anonymousoperatorsearchresults_new.asp) I would like to scrape all the companies which are Heavy Goods Vehicle (HGV) Operators in the following areas:

London
Chelmsford
Witham
Colchester
Basildon
Tilbury
Ipswich
Maldon
Cambridge
Harlow
Suffolk
Norwich

I need all of the following details from this site:

Name
Trading Names	
Contact Address
Company Directors	
Operating Centres
Vehicles
Trailers
Transport Managers

Once you have the list of companies then please scrape from Google their phone number.
